title: Gasoline price per liter in selected countries - December 2019
yAxis: Price per liter in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price per liter in U.S. dollars for 8 number of Countrys.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
The lowest value at Country United States is 2.59x times less than the highest value at Italy.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Price per liter in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars is highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price per liter in U.S. dollars for 8 number of Countrys.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
The lowest value at Country United States is 2.59x times less than the highest value at Italy.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Price per liter in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars of Country Italy is 2.59% larger than the minimum value at United States.
Country Italy is higher than any other Countrys with value 1.76, followed by France, and United Kingdom. Down to Country United States with the lowest value 0.68.
The Country United States has 1.28 times less Price per liter in U.S. dollars than average.
The Price per liter in U.S. dollars is 11.01 if we add up values of all Countrys.
